1215330.name: Metal Heads Demo
1215330.description:
[h1]DEMO VERSION[/h1]
The demo version is designed to give you a small sample of the type of quality and gameplay that will come with the full game when it eventually launches.
The demo will currently feature 6 super fun, and challenging mini-games out of the 30 mini-games Metal Heads will eventually launch with, with more unlocking as the game gets closer to it's release date.
You can either choose to play the mini-games by selecting what one you would like to play, or run a continuous random loop.

This demo does not contain all features, (it is just a handful of mini-games) but will still give you plenty of entertainment when you feel like playing a party game alone or with friends.
Most of the mini-games in the demo are crazy survival mini-games, and are a challenge even to play in solo mode, with additional modes for survival mini-games so you are not limited by a timer, but can see how long you survive for.
While there are no leaderboards yet, do not hesitate to brag about your survival skills in the forums and compete with the community to see who is the ultimate metal head.

An added note is that in the gameplay menu, there is a feature to enable melee which allows players to slap one another using LB and RB. While the game wasn't designed with this in mind, and generally becomes infuriating to play, some people enjoy this style of gameplay, and what kind of developer would I be to deny that opportunity.

MESSAGE FROM THE DEVELOPER

Metal Heads is made by one person with a day job and busy life, so please bear with me with any bugs and issues, as well as content updates.
I am working around the clock to give you guys something super fun and exciting to play, and hope that you can understand that sometimes it will take a few days to resolve certain issues if I cannot immediately fix them.
I cannot wait to keep adding content to the demo so you guys can try something new every now and then, this is my passion and I enjoy that others enjoy my creation.

Thank you all for playing, you guys are awesome! Rock on!

NOT ALL FEATURES BELOW ARE PART OF THE DEMO




Metal Heads is a crazy, action packed party game where up to 8 of you and your friends go head to head in a series of challenging, but fun mini-games.
Featuring over 30 mini-games, multiple board game modes, character customization, mini-game and board game level editors, with much more content to come post-launch.
Metal Heads aims to give you an all round party game experience that will never leave you wanting more and make you want to come back to it for years to come.

8 PLAYERS LOCAL

Are you tired of looking for party games to play and finding that they only support 4 players? Yeah...me too.
Metal Heads supports up to 8 players LOCALLY, which means that everyone should be able to join in on the action.

ONLINE

(Unavailable in Demo version)
It's sometimes difficult to gather 8 people together to play a game, so Metal Heads will launch with online multiplayer support!

COUCH COMBO

(Unavailable in Demo version)
Do you want to play with more people, but don't have enough at the party?
Create an online server, and let online players join in on the fun.

DROP IN - DROP OUT

Never feel left out when you arrive late to the party.
Join a game at any time, and when you're done, drop out at any time with the push of a button.

OVER 30 MINI-GAMES

Your skill will be put to the test in over 30 mini-games, each designed to cater to a variety of different skills.
(Demo version only contains 6 mini-games to begin with, and will eventually be updated with more over time.)

Are you great at platformers?
Are you AWESOME at Quick Time Events?
Are you even better at Racing games?
Do you have the Memory of an elephant and are fantastic at logic based games?
NO PROBLEM!
Metal Heads has something for everyone!
But only one can be the ultimate Metal Head.

MORE MINI-GAMES TO COME

Metal Heads will feature 30+ mini-games at launch, with over 100 mini-games planned for the future.
So even if you buy the game on launch date, there will be new mini-games added frequently so that you never get bored.

ROLL THE DICE

Metal Heads features the ever popular board game mode.
Roll the dice, then run to your destination!

ROLL, RUN, JUMP, REPEAT

(Unavailable in Demo version)
What sets Metal Heads classic board game apart from other games doing the same thing?
You actually have to move your character yourself, requiring you run and jump over platforms and obstacles, collect bonus points, take super risky, but highly rewarding shortcuts, all to get to your destination, and if you don't make it, you go back to where you started.

NOT JUST THE CLASSIC

(Unavailable in Demo version)
Metal Heads will eventually feature more than one type of board game.
Each new board game mode playing differently to the last, and each are inspired by some of the greats!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR METAL HEAD

(Unavailable in Demo version - Players can choose their heads though)
Metal Heads features a basic character customization at the character selection screen using character presets, but eventually, you will be able to create a more personalized and unique metal heads in the character customizer, simply select a template, then add accessories, like antenna's, eye sockets, dangling things, capes, logo's and much more!

STAGE EDITOR

(Unavailable in Demo version)
Metal Heads is planned to have a stage editor after launch...or maybe even AT launch, so that when you get bored of playing the same stage over and over, you can create your own.
This is not limited to just mini-games either, you will be able to create new board game maps too!
And it just wouldn't be too exciting if you couldn't share your creations with the rest of the world right?
So the stage editor will be compatible with the Steam workshop, where you can upload your creations, as well as download other players creations.

BANG YOUR HEAD

(Demo version contains mostly temporary music while music is being created)
Metal Heads wouldn't really live up to it's name if it didn't feature some fun metal music to bang your heads too.
Every mini-game features unique music tracks, each with a metal influence, however aren't really heavy and in your face, so you won't get tired of hearing the same track over and over again...not that it would be a bad thing, since all of the tracks are AWESOME!

Metal Heads is also featuring music from lead guitarist of Mors Principium Est, Andy Gillion, who will bring the metal, into Metal Heads.
In the future, there are plans to get some other well known metal artists on board, so you can listen to their amazing creations while playing a super fun game!
